fields.request: Validate screen Markdown reader TOC text wrapping
fields.request_details: Open the OCPP Roadmap cookbook in the Markdown reader and scroll through the left-hand contents sidebar on a desktop display. Confirm long section titles wrap to the next line instead of forcing a horizontal scrollbar at any zoom level. Resize the browser between 992px and full HD widths to double-check that the sidebar continues to avoid horizontal scrolling and that links remain readable.
